import axios from'axios';// ** Get User Profile
export var getUserProfile=function getUserProfile(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/apps/chat/users/profile-user').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:'GET_USER_PROFILE',userProfile:res.data});});};};// ** Get Chats & Contacts
export var getChatContacts=function getChatContacts(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/apps/chat/chats-and-contacts').then(function(res){dispatch({type:'GET_CHAT_CONTACTS',data:res.data});});};};// ** Select Chat
export var selectChat=function selectChat(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/apps/chat/get-chat',{id:id}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'SELECT_CHAT',data:res.data});dispatch(getChatContacts());});};};// ** Send Msg
export var sendMsg=function sendMsg(obj){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/apps/chat/send-msg',{obj:obj}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'SEND_MSG',data:res.data});dispatch(selectChat(obj.contact.id));});};};
